divs: Sighting DetailsI live east of fort Vancouver, I cannot see the fireworks at the fort from my place but can hear them. I can see the Columbia river. I see planes every day and night across the water at the Portland air port. Anyway it was abot 1100pm give or take and I was looking towards the fort to see if I could see the fireworks. I then noticed the big dipper . then what caugt my eye was this light. it flew towards the bottom right corner star then just disappeared like it left our space then another then another then another. one more then nothing. I thought they must have watched the fireworks and are headed home. really that was my thought. end of story. I reported one that I had seen in the seventies in willams calif. these are the only unexplained things I have seen. these are both true and clearly no one will ever tell me different ever
Summary: 4-5 yellow orange lights flying at the bottom tip of the big dipper . one after another flew and dissapeared
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were 3 other sightings in Washington on or around July 4th 2013
